name: Nasty Rick
description:
This multiplayer card game is Cards Against Humanity on steroids. Guaranteed to light up any party or cure your solo boredom (so that you can lay off watching all those reruns of The Office).

-HOW TO PLAY-
Start a game with 4-7 friends
Complete hilarious and obscene statements by filling in the blank with your answer cards
Each round, a judge picks the best combination
First player to win 5 rounds wins the game
Indulge in 1000+ gloriously nasty cards

*NEW*
Browse extended decks & choose from 18+ premium packs to enhance your game experience
